title: Redeem Code Error.
body:
Hey, i just started playing league after 2 years break :O , so i decided to create new account.
But to the point, i wanted to have "free" garen , so i followed twitter , and get code...
The rest is simple "ctrl+ c ~ ctrl + v" , and it won't work... 
Here's a screenshoot with and error.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YMqVglm.png[/img]


Thanks for help !{{champion:432}}

@Edit: I'm trying to redeem code since yesterday.

replies.body:
For this issue, we'll need you to submit a support ticket so we can sort this out with you. ^.^

If you have any questions, let me know.
you should try doing it on the legacy client. if it doesnt work, hit up riot support i guess?
